#define CONTEXT_SWITCH_PREAMBLE (   ) 
 

Value:

{  \
   asm volatile( \
   "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t" \
   "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t" \
      : "=r" (current_thread->sp) : ); \
   \
   asm volatile( \
      "out __SP_L__, %A0\n\t" \
      "out __SP_H__, %B0\n\t" \
      :: "r" (stack_addr) ); \
   \
   asm volatile( \
      "push %A0\n\t" \
      "push %B0\n\t" \
      :: "r" (start_wrapper) ); \
   \
   for(i = 0; i < 33; i++) \
      asm volatile("push __zero_reg__\n\t" ::); \
   \
   asm volatile( \
      "in %A0, __SP_L__\n\t" \
      "in %B0, __SP_H__\n\t" \
      : "=r" (threads[id].sp) : ); \
   \
   asm volatile( \
      "out __SP_L__, %A0\n\t" \
      "out __SP_H__, %B0\n\t" \
      :: "r" (current_thread->sp) ); \
    \
}
